summary: A teenage girl whose inaction caused her mother's death arranges a similarly gruesome fate for her stepmother and brother.
cast: Anthony Franciosa|Sybil Danning|Isabelle Mejias|Paul Hubbard|Cindy Girling|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Michael Tregor|Natascha Rybakowski|Benjamin Schmoll|Elizabeth Paddon|Benjamin Gordan|Terrea Smith|Dwayne McLean|Jack Jessop|Margareta Rance|Grahame Lintell
keywords: stepmother|murder plot|evil girl|sister tries to kill brother|insane jealousy
title: Julie
